reviews.review: It's sparked my interest and made me cry at points it was a very amazing movie with plot twist everywhere I can't begin to explain to you how great it was
I wish there was more dialogue to help with the plot, but the visuals were absolutely fantastic and the movie kept me on edge the whole time.
The movie is really good. Goes for a long time and has a lot of funny parts. Some parts of the movie were a bit slow but... personally it was overrated but still really good. Black Panther is better!

I saw this movie in 3D. My son came with me and he really dslikes 3D. However, I have to admit this movie had the best 3D effects of any movie that I've seen. For the first time ever, my son was thrilled to finally see a decent 3D film. He is familiar with the comics and wondered how they could possibly complete the story line in a 2.5 hour movie. LITTLE SPOILER ALERT: It isn't completed in a single movie. There were a few questionable decisions made by some of the superheroes but this show was show amazing, who really cares? I'm frustrated that I now have to wait a WHOLE year to see the finality of what happens, given the end of the movie.

After 10 years plus of building up, this was well worth every penny and every second in the theatre. I can't wait for Avengers 4 to see how they work in the reversal. Anyone who hates on this movie has clearly too much vested in antiquated comics or can't respect the difficulty of getting so many stories together. The story captivates you, connects you to the main characters Thor, Hulk, Iron Man, Captain America and helps combine their struggle over the years into an end game. This is a film to watch and to enjoy.

It's nothing short of a cinematic masterpiece of story telling. It is the Empire Strikes Back of the Marvel Cinematic Universe. Phenomenal. Makes having watched the rest of the films worth it and I can't wait to see what happens next.

One of the best Marvel movies! A must see in theaters for sure. lots of killing obviously so be cautious on taking your kids. The Hulk was lame! Guardians were amazing, everyone else was amazing come to think of it! Love Iron Man! ðŸ’•
i saw and it was a really good show all the fight scenes was clean and made sence in the right oder from nowhere to earth then to space it was epic
Excellent Movie, thrilling and funny, great job bravo !
